criterion: Provides overly technical or medical jargon
Does not address the user's specific request about next advanced HIV medication
Provides accurate information about integrase inhibitors and single tablet combinations
Asks the user about their current medication regimen or previous treatments
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the benefits and side effects of advanced HIV medications
Fails to mention the importance of consulting a healthcare professional before switching HIV medications
Provides incorrect information about the effectiveness of integrase inhibitors or single tablet combinations
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's needs and concerns
Does not provide any information about the potential interactions between advanced HIV medications and other medications the user is taking
